Text:
Hey shipJ, thank you for keeping us up to date with our favorite comics! :)

Do you know if you'll be able to post Speaker of the Dead 4 from Ender's Game for your next batch??

Does anyone know why Knights of the Dinner Table stopped being included in these releases?

1-167 are available, but 168-172, the new ones can't be found anywhere.

If anyone knows a lead and could share it; it'd be appreciated.
